title: National First-Generation Day Celebration
detail: Come to CC to celebrate National First-generation day! We will have pin making, a photo campaign, and a great community to celebrate with!

title: First-Gen/Quest Day Celebration!
detail: Come join First Gen Collective and Questbridge virtually from 4-6pm! We'll be celebrating and getting to know other FGLI students. We hope to see you all there!

title: Thanksgiving at Tufts
detail: Join your fellow Jumbos for a Thanksgiving dinner! (RSVP required)

title: Virtual Fun Night
detail: Join in playing classic games like Among Us, Just Dance, and more! We'll also be giving out Grub Hub gift cards to the winners!

title: Self-care Grab & Go
detail: Join us at the FIRST porch for our self-care grab and go! Weâ€™ll have some self-care bags, so make sure to come while supplies last!

title: Start Your Own Herb Garden: Plant Grab-n-Go!
detail: Join First-Gen Collective and Tufts' QuestBridge Chapter for a plant grab-n-go! We'll be giving out plants to the first 50 people to come!
